about_the_game:
It's been 10 years since you graduated from a private Christian all-girls high school, and you decided to head to the unofficial reunion hosted by your old bestie. It's a weekend retreat at a fancy vineyard you photograph happy couples at all the time, but when you get there...

You're the only cis woman who was invited?!

And everyone you went to school with is a hot guy now??

~~~

Good Lord! Everyone at the Reunion For My Religious All-Girls School Is a Trans Man... And They're Hot?! (or Trans Masc Reunion for short) is a romantic comedy otome game featuring a cast of all trans masculine love interests. Catch up with your old graduating class and maybe learn a thing or two about yourself in a hilarious weekend romp at a posh vineyard. What could possibly go wrong?

Features

  • 3 Trans Masc Love Interests

  • All Happy Endings!

  • Original OST

  • Original Character Art

  • Playable Wordcount: 30k+

  • Goose.

Your Love Interests

Elias delos Santos the Party Host

Pronouns: he/him 

Ethnicity: Filipino American

Occupation: Wedding & Events Coordinator

Your high school bestie, a social media hound, and just about the only person you kept in touch with from high school all these years. He came out to you 9 years ago and has been the singular queer person you personally know (or at least, that's what you thought). You're not sure if you've ever met anyone as simultaneously chill and stressed out as Elias is, but hopefully he can relax this weekend.

Angel Devin the Withdrawn Metalhead

Pronouns: xe/xem/xir, he/him

Ethnicity: African American

Occupation: Farming Co-Op Organizer

Voted "Most Likely To Be Possessed By Demons" by the class, Angel used to be the weird outcast whose metal music you could hear from xir earbuds while passing by. Xe has a tendency to wander away from large crowds, but you attribute that to xem being more shy than misanthropic. Honestly, what concerns you more is the fact that no one seems bothered by Angel going off by xir lonesome.

Liam Goodwin aka LuciferSatan69420

Pronouns: he/him

Ethnicity: Caucasian American

Occupation: Social Media Influencer

A former Christian cheerleader who preached and practiced "Modest is Hottest." In the last two years however he’s made a full 180° to “All Skin, All Sin.” He takes immense pride in the video series that turned him into a star, “ASMR I’m Your Mean Boyfriend.” Will you finally have the chance to get some revenge on Liam this weekend?

content_descriptors.notes: Certain scenarios in the game involve sexual tension between adults, including intimate situations and heavy innuendo. No visual or textual depictions of sexual content are included in the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distro released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, Raspberry Pi 4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit stereo with 48KHz playback

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit stereo with 48KHz playback

name: Good Lord! Everyone at the Reunion For My Religious All-Girls School Is a Trans Man... And They're Hot?!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300, Snapdragon X Elite
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-bit stereo with 48KHz playback

short_description: Are you really the only woman at the ten year reunion for your religious all-girls high school?! Catch up with your old graduating class and maybe learn a thing or two about yourself in a hilarious weekend romp at a posh vineyard. What could possibly go wrong?
